about_the_game:
Join the puzzle stampede and gallop into the world of horses. Assemble beautiful images of these magnificent creatures and immerse yourself in a challenging and enjoyable equine experience.

Puzzle Images

Count: 50
detailed_description:
Join the puzzle stampede and gallop into the world of horses. Assemble beautiful images of these magnificent creatures and immerse yourself in a challenging and enjoyable equine experience.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13 and above
  • Processor: 2014 or newer Intel Core i5 / AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.13 and above
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 64-bit capable processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATi GPU with 2GB+ Memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
